Name: ACCx_PR_1B
Long description: The ACCX_PR_1B Product contains pre-processed acceleration data. The data are not calibrated to the final level of accuracy as this is part of the Precise Orbit Determination (Level 2 processing).

Name: ASMx_AUX1B
Short description: S/C magnetic stray fields at ASM sensor position
Long description: The ASMXAUX_1B Product contains detailed information on the S/C magnetic stray fields at the ASM sensor position. The data are provided at 50 Hz at the time-instants of the VFM measurements (for internal practical purposes); the stray field vectors are provided in the ASM sensor frame.

Name: EFIx_LP_1B
Short description: Electric field instrument (Langmuir probe measurements at 2Hz)
Long description: The EFIXLPI_1B Product contains the EFIX_LP_1B plasma data interpolated at full UTC seconds, the same as the low resolution magnetic data MAG_LR.

Name: EFIxLPI_1B
Short description: Electric field instrument (Langmuir probe measurements at 1Hz)
Long description: The EFIX_LP_1B Product contains plasma data from the Langimur Probe (LP) of the Electrical Field Instrument (EFI). The plasma product encompasses the plasma density and temperature. Data is provided at 2 Hz rate. The time instant are determined by the EFI instruments. No interpolation of the EFI data is performed, neither to shift the measurements in time nor to fill any gaps.

Name: GPSxNAV_1B
Long description: Position and velocity from the on-board navigational solution of the GPSR. Data Set Records are MDR_NAVSP3 which are SP3c format.

Name: GPSx_RN_1B
Long description: The GPSX_RN_1B Products store GPSR data in the RINEX 3.00 format generally used for LEO satellites.

Name: GPSx_RO_1B
Long description: The GPSX_RO_1B Products store GPSR data in the RINEX 3.00 format generally used for LEO satellites.

Name: LP_x_CA_1B
Long description: The LP_X_CA_1B Product contains the TCF.LP Data Set records containing the LP calibration parameters determined in the Level 1b Processor from the Offset Determination Sweep Mode telemetry including the measurements themselves.

Name: MAGx_CA_1B
Short description: Magnetic vector and scalar data for monitoring and calibration purposes
Long description: The MAGX_CA_1B Product contains magnetic vector and scalar data for monitoring, TCF.VFM verification, and calibration purposes. It contains raw as well as processed VFM vector measurements, VFM temperatures, and fully converted and corrected ASM measurements at 1 Hz rate. This is essentially the data used for the TCF.VFM estimation but including also the raw VFM data.

Name: MAGx_HR_1B
Long description: The MAGX_HR_1B Product contains magnetic vector data at 50 Hz rate. The time instants of the data are determined by the VFM instrument samplings. No interpolation of the magnetic data is performed, neither to shift the measurements in time nor to fill any gaps in the VFM source data. The measurement data set record of the MAGX_HR_1B Product is described in Table 2. See also Mag-H Data Set Record, MDR_MAG_HR.

Name: MAGx_LR_1B
Short description: Magnetic field (1Hz) from VFM and ASM
Long description: The MAGX_LR_1B Product contains magnetic vector and scalar data at 1 Hz rate. The S/C data are processed to provide MAGX_LR_1B data at exact UTC seconds, i.e. both VFM vector and ASM scalar data are interpolated to yield these data. Hence, small gaps in the VFM or ASM data need not cause gaps in the product as the gaps may be filled by this interpolation. Any gaps, however, will have an impact on the error estimate of the associated product element. The measurement data set record of the MAGX_LR_1B Product is described in Table 3. See also Mag-L Data Set Record, MDR_MAG_LR.

Name: MODx_SC_1B
Short description: Satellite Position and velocity from the preliminary Medium Accuracy Orbit Determination
Long description: Position and velocity from the preliminary Medium Accuracy Orbit Determination (MOD). Data Set Records are MDR_MODSP3 which are SP3c format.

Name: AUXxORBCNT
Long description: The AUXxORBCNT product contains the Swarm orbit numbers. The new Swarm Orbit Counter data file is referred with a new dedicated product type (ORBxCNT), and it provides precise Swarm orbit number information to the scientific user community.

Name: SC_xDYN_1B
Short description: Auxiliary data needed for precise orbit determination and non-gravitational force modelling
Long description: The SC_XDYN_1B Product contains auxiliary data needed for precise orbit determination and non-gravitational force modelling.

Name: STRxATT_1B
Long description: Attitude information at S/C level based on STR data.

Name: VFMxAUX_1B
Short description: S/C magnetic stray fields and Sun induced stray field at VFM sensor position
Long description: The VFMXAUX_1B Product contains detailed information on the S/C magnetic stray fields and the Sun induced stray field (implemented from Product Baseline 04) at the VFM sensor position. The data are provided at 50 Hz at the time-instants of the VFM measurements; the stray field vectors are provided in the VFM sensor frame.

Name: MAGxSCAR1B
Long description: Level 1b data set produced for the investigations of the scalar residuals between the readings of the scalar magnetometer (ASM) and the vector magnetometer (VFM)

Name: MAGx_LR_1B*
Long description: An updated version of the MAGx_LR_1B products

Name: EFIx_TCT16
Long description: TII Level 1b dataset at 16 Hz cadence containing cross-track ion measurements along with the electric field, magnetic field in the same coordinate frame

Name: EFIx_LP_FP
Long description: Ionospheric electron density derived from the faceplate current at 16 Hz

Name: EFIx_TCT02
Long description: TII Level 1b dataset at 2 Hz cadence containing cross-track ion measurements along with the electric field, magnetic field in the same coordinate frame

Name: EFIx_LP_HM
Long description: An extended dataset at 2 Hz cadence containing the electron temperature and spacecraft potential measured separately by the two probes

Name: EFIx_LP_1B*
Long description: Level 1B Langmuir Probes parameters (ionospheric electron density and temperature and Spacecraft potential) derived by IRF

Name: EFIx_TII1B*
Long description: Level 1B Thermal Ion Imagers parameters (ionospheric ions bulk speed and temperature, ionospheric electric field) derived by the University of Calgary

Name: ACCxCAL_2_
Long description: Time series of non-gravitational and aerodynamic accelerations obtained by POD

Name: ACCxPOD_2_
Long description: Time series of non-gravitational and aerodynamic accelerations obtained by POD

Name: AEJxLPL_2F
Short description: Auroral electrojets line profile - Line current method (LC)
Long description: Characterization of the electrojet sheet current density as well as the total horizontal sheet and associated large-scale field-aligned current density along the Swarm orbit ionospheric footprints at auroral latitudes (by using LC method).

Name: AEJxPBL_2F
Short description: Auroral electrojets peaks and boundaries from LC
Long description: Characterization of the auroral electrojets and auroral oval boundaries (by using LC method).

Name: AEJxLPS_2F
Short description: Auroral electrojets line profile - SECS method
Long description: Characterization of the electrojet sheet current density as well as the total horizontal sheet and associated large-scale field-aligned current density along the Swarm orbit ionospheric footprints at auroral latitudes (by using SECS method).

Name: AEJxPBS_2F
Short description: Auroral electrojets peaks and boundaries from SECS
Long description: Characterization of the auroral electrojets and auroral oval boundaries (by using SECS method).

Name: AOBxFAC_2F
Short description: Auroral oval boundaries derived from FACs
Long description: Auroral oval boundaries, associated with auroral precipitation, estimated from the presence of small-scale (<150 km) field-aligned currents.

Name: DNSxACC_2_
Long description: Thermospheric density at the satellite location derived from ACCxCAL_2

Name: DNSxPOD_2_
Long description: Thermospheric density at the satellite location along with auxiliary parameters (altitude, latitude, longitude and local solar time). Derived from non-gravitational accelerations based on precise orbit determination data only (ACCxPOD_2_)

Name: EEFxTMS_2F
Long description: Estimate of eastward equatorial electric field component, by using magnetic measurements of the equatorial electrojet (EEJ) current as the satellites fly overhead. Since the magnetic signal of the EEJ current is directly measured by the satellite, this product also provides an estimate of the EEJ current strength.

Name: FACxTMS_2F
Long description: Time series of field-aligned and radial current densities along the orbit from single satellite measurements. Field-aligned current (FAC) density is derived by the multiplication of the radial current (IRC) density with the inclination angle of the geomagnetic field. The field-aligned current density can only be calculated at latitudes, where the magnetic field is well inclined, i.e. |I| > 30°. Near the magnetic equator for magnetic inclination angles |I| < 30° FAC values are set to NaN. The radial current density can be provided along the whole orbit. Scale size >7.5 km.

Name: FAC_TMS_2F
Long description:
Time series of field-aligned and radial current densities along the orbit using the dual-satellite method. Field-aligned current (FAC) density is derived by the multiplication of the radial current (IRC) density with the inclination angle of the geomagnetic field. The field-aligned current density can only be calculated at latitudes, where the magnetic field is well inclined, i.e. |I| > 30°. Near the magnetic equator for magnetic inclination angles |I| < 30° FAC values are set to NaN. The radial current density can be provided along the whole orbit, except for latitudes θ>86° (near poles), where both FAC and IRC values are set to NaN. 

Note that the magnetic field data used for the dual-satellite method is low-pass filtered with a 3-dB cutoff period of 20 s (corresponding to a wavelength of 150 km). This step is indispensable because the lateral distance between Swarm A and Swarm C has to be taken into account.

Name: IBIxTMS_2F
Long description: By combining electron density and magnetic field observations the IBI product gives information on bubble climatology and on disturbance level of magnetic field data.

Name: IPDxIRR_2F
Short description: Contains ionospheric plasma characteristics from multiple instruments derived at 1Hz, updated daily with 24-hour timespan
Long description: Time series of characteristics of the plasma density and plasma irregularities along the orbit from single satellite measurements. Time series of local plasma conditions, including background density and total electron content. Data related to geomagnetic regions in the ionosphere. Indication of severity of plasma irregularities for ground-based users provided

Name: TECxTMS_2F
Long description: Integrated electron density along the line of sight from Swarm to GNSS satellites

Name: EGF_SHA_2_
Short description: Monthly gravity field of the Earth
Long description: Monthly average of Earth's gravity field, i.e. with an implicit epoch located at the middle of the calendar month

Name: MCO_SHA_2C
Short description: Spherical harmonic model of the main (core) field and its temporal variation
Long description: Spherical harmonic model of the main (core) field and its temporal variation derived in Comprehensive Inversion chain

Name: MCO_SHA_2D
Short description: Spherical harmonic model of the main (core) field and its temporal variation
Long description: Spherical harmonic model of the main (core) field and its temporal variation derived in Dedicated Inversion chain

Name: MCO_SHA_2F
Short description: Spherical harmonic model of the main (core) field and its temporal variation

Name: MCO_SHA_2X
Short description: Spherical harmonic model of the main (core) field and its temporal variation

Name: MCO_SHA_2E
Short description: Spherical harmonic model of the main (core) field and its temporal variation

Name: MCR_1DM_2_
Short description: Model of electrical conductivity of the mantle
Long description: Model of electrical conductivity of the mantle for its 1-D structure, meaning that the conductivity is assumed to only vary with depth

Name: MIN_1DM_2_
Short description: Model of electrical conductivity of the mantle
Long description: Model of electrical conductivity of the mantle for its 1-D structure, meaning that the conductivity is assumed to only vary with depth

Name: MIO_SHA_2C
Short description: Model of non-polar daily geomagnetic variation caused by ionospheric currents
Long description: Model of non-polar daily geomagnetic variation caused by ionospheric currents, including their variability with season and solar flux, derived in Comprehensive Inversion chain

Name: MIO_SHA_2D
Short description: Model of non-polar daily geomagnetic variation caused by ionospheric currents
Long description: Model of non-polar daily geomagnetic variation caused by ionospheric currents, including their variability with season and solar flux, derived in Dedicated Ionospheric Field Inversion chain

Name: MIO_SHA_2E
Short description: Model of polar daily geomagnetic variation caused by ionospheric currents

Name: MLI_SHA_2C
Short description: Spherical Harmonic Models of the lithospheric field
Long description: Spherical Harmonic Models of the lithospheric field and its temporal variation derived in Comprehensive Inversion chain

Name: MLI_SHA_2D
Short description: Spherical Harmonic Models of the lithospheric field
Long description: Spherical Harmonic Models of the lithospheric field and its temporal variation derived with the Revised Spherical Harmonic Cap method

Name: MLI_SHA_2E
Short description: Spherical Harmonic Models of the lithospheric field

Name: MMA_SHA_2C
Short description: Timeseries of spherical harmonic expansion coefficients of the large-scale magnetospheric field
Long description: Electromagnetic transfer functions (C-responses) related to the model of electrical conductivity of the mantle for its 1-D structure, meaning that the conductivity is assumed to only vary with depth

Name: MMA_SHA_2F
Short description: Timeseries of spherical harmonic expansion coefficients of the large-scale magnetospheric field
Long description: Timeseries of spherical harmonic expansion coefficients of the large-scale magnetospheric field and its Earth-induced counterpart derived in Dedicated Inversion chain. This is a fast-track product which is provided without an independent regular validation

Name: MTI_SHA_2C
Short description: Model of the M2 oceanic tidal signal

Name: VOBS_1M_2_
Short description: One-monthly time series of vector magnetic field values at fixed locations, on a uniform grid at satellite altitude
Long description: Such data, regularly distributed in space and time are suitable for modelling the main geomagnetic field, for core flow inversion studies, and for data assimilation studies of the core dynamo process.

Name: VOBS_4M_2_
Short description: Four-monthly time series of vector magnetic field values at fixed locations, on a uniform grid at satellite altitude
Long description: Such data, regularly distributed in space and time are suitable for modelling the main geomagnetic field, for core flow inversion studies, and for data assimilation studies of the core dynamo process.

Name: IBP_CLI_2_
Short description: Climatological model of ionospheric bubble probability

Name: AUX_OBSH2_
Short description: Hourly values derived from both WDC and INTERMAGNET data
